body:
Hi Randolph,


Not quite sure what you are looking for, perhaps this is a good starting 
point though:


    http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-October/001029.html


If I remember, Lu/Lv coordinates are mapped over a normalized space 
relating to the aspect ratio of the image being textured....


-Jack
